Package cesur.zakaria.pokemonprojectzakariafarih.model.pokemon.pokemons

Class StatistiquePokemon

java.lang.Object
cesur.zakaria.pokemonprojectzakariafarih.model.pokemon.pokemons.StatistiquePokemon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class StatistiquePokemon extends Object implements Serializable
The StatistiquePokemon class represents the statistics of a Pokémon, including damage, defense, special damage, special defense, experience level, and hit points.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • StatistiquePokemon

      public StatistiquePokemon(int dmg, int def, int dmgspe, int defspe, int xpLevel, int pv)
      Constructs a StatistiquePokemon object with the specified statistics.
      Parameters:
      dmg - The damage stat of the Pokémon.
      def - The defense stat of the Pokémon.
      dmgspe - The special damage stat of the Pokémon.
      defspe - The special defense stat of the Pokémon.
      xpLevel - The experience level of the Pokémon.
      pv - The hit points (HP) of the Pokémon.
